short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the GitHub Icon Color Randomly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension changes the current styling of the github header Octocat. It will change the color from white to any color in the rainbow, which looks great against the black header bar that is not very lively. A small, but warm change for the career developer.
